paragraph.paragraph: Adding and removing project references is no different from adding references in other langugages such as Visual C# and Visual Basic .NET. EiffelEnvision does however introduce a new type of reference, which is described in this section of the documentation.

adding_components.xml Adding Component References
The information on adding component references to EiffelEnvision projects.

removing_components.xml Removing References
The information on removing component references from EiffelEnvision projects.

precompiled_libraries.xml Precompiled Libraries
The precompiled library mechanism for binary reused within EiffelEnvision.
